 Two Delphi components that displays drives combo box or list box with       
 associated icons.                                                           
 Tested in Delphi 2 and 4, but I think that allready works in other 32 bit   
 Delphi versions (mail me some possible problems).                           
 The source code is not public domain and can be distributed                 
 only with this file. For updates and more components visit my homepage      
 (see bellow). Mail me some bugs and good ideas (see mail bellow).           
                                                                             
쳐컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴
 Properties:                                                                 
                                                                             
 AutoUpdate      - Specifies if refresh drives list every time combo box     
                   dropped down (only for TDVDrivesCombo).                   
 DisplayBrackets - Specifies if display brackets around volume label. Have   
                   no effect if DisplaySysName property is set to true.      
 DisplayIcons    - Specifies if display associated icons.                    
 DisplayLabel    - Specifies if display volume label. Have no effect if      
                   DisplaySysName property is set to true.                   
 DisplaySysName  - Specifies if display default Windows drive name.          
 Drive           - Contains selected drive letter.                           
 IconsSize       - Specifies size of associated icons.                       
 TextCase        - Specifies text case of drive label. Have no effect if     
                   DisplaySysName property is set to true.                   
 ViewDrivesType  - Specifies which drives by type to display.                
                                                                             
 Methods:                                                                    
                                                                             
 UpdateDrives    - Updates drives list.
